title: So can we get champion mastery back now?
body:
When your icon pops up it no longer has a lvl 4/5/6/7 border.

Im not sure why it's gone, but can we have it back please?
We worked very hard to get lvl 7 champions, and removing the rewards of having them just doesn't seem right.

You look like a twat when you spam your lvl 7 all the time _(the truth hurts Lee Sin)_, and having the border subtly showed people that you have indeed put the effort into a champion, without you having to obnoxiously spam your mastery.

Im told it was removed because of emotes, and I really hope that is not the case, especially seeming no one really wanted them in the first place, and the fact that they cost RP _(let alone individually cost pretty much the same as a ward)_, killed the whole thing outright.

replies.body: Hnnnng damn it. I hate when little things like champ voice lines/animations/particles/the server disappear for seemingly no reason. I'll ask around and see if this is a known issue and if it's OCE only. Do you have a source on it being due to Emotes? I might be out of the loop on that.

Does that mean it might be a bug and not intentional?
That would make my day!

No I don't have a source, it's just what other players have been talking about in game. And for the lack of any other suggestions it seemed the most viable reason. But like I said, I'm hoping it's not that.
Definitely not intended. I poked some dudes in Central Riot and they're looking into the cause, so thank you for the report.
It was fixed for a couple hours and now its back to the way it was are we gonna get it back i didn't work hard to get the mastery to have it taken away from me :/
Thanks for reporting it again. I've alerted the team responsible and we'll try to get this fixed again.
Any more information if we are getting it back?
I agree! I worked too hard to get my Mastery 6's and my one Mastery 7
